mapper.select: select a_idx, idx, content, check_alarm, url, a.u_idx, link, m.profilephoto from alarm a join member m on a.u_idx = m.u_idx where a.u_idx = ${u_idx} order by a_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into alarm (a_idx, idx, content, check_alarm, url, u_idx, link) values(alarm_a_idx_seq.nextval, '${idx}', '${content}', 0, '${url}', #{u_idx}, '${link}')
mapper.select: select a.url , a.u_idx, b.nickname , b.profilephoto from WORKSPACE_USER a join member b on a.u_idx = b.u_idx where a.url = '${url}'
mapper.update: UPDATE alarm SET check_alarm=1 WHERE a_idx=#{a_idx}
UPDATE alarm SET check_alarm=1 WHERE u_idx=#{u_idx}
